register_quote: Registration is the beginning of the journey to a million flies!
login_quote: Login is the first step towards wealth!

home.main-quote: I used to think that wealth was just a lot of flies in the fridge. Now I know: success is understanding where your flies go!
home.financial-quote: "Being a frog isn't easy... But managing money with Kermit is!"
home.financial-benefit-2: Add income and expenses faster than Kermit catches flies!
home.financial-benefit-4: All your money in one little swamp
home.transfer-quote: "Managing finances should be no harder than hopping lily pads!"
home.analytics-quote: "Tracking your money is as easy as Kermit tracking flies!"
